title: Stack Overflow: How We Do Monitoring - 2018 Edition
description:
This is #4 in a very long series of posts on Stack Overflow’s architecture.
Previous post (#3): Stack Overflow: How We Do Deployment - 2016 Edition

What is monitoring? As far as I can tell, it means different things to different people. But we more or less agree on the concept. I think. Maybe. Let’s find out! When someone says monitoring, I think of:

title: Themed Hacknight: Coding for Gender Equality @ GIPHY
description: November 29, 2018 GIPHY HQ – New York, NY GIPHY Engineering is hosting Women Who Code + genEquality’s themed hacknight “Coding for Gender Equality.” This is a general hacknight that will also allow participants who want to work on a genEquality project the opportunity to form a group and start a project for the hackathon. […]
